title: Jefferson Burdick's Tom Downey fielding for trade
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Jefferson Burdick's Tom Downey fielding for trade
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys,

I recently found this card from Jeff Burdick's collection.  I don't really know what the market is for a card like this, but if I can add a tough-ish back or two to my collection, I would trade it.

Looking for all the Old Mill backs that I need, as well as American Beauty, Cycle, Hindu, etc.

Thanks for looking, and if you have any info about past sales or trades of Burdick's T206s that you'd like to share, please shoot me a PM.

Luke
